name: order
description: Order dishes from a web app to manage customer orders

scripts.start: rm -rf lib && babel src/server -d lib && cp -r src/server/public lib/public && node lib/server.js
scripts.startWindows: rmdir lib /Q/S && babel src/server -d lib && xcopy src\server\public lib\public /E/I/Y && node lib/server.js

author: Markus Friesen
